N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 487.8 - Identifying comparison areas

State Regulations
(a) The
applicant shall use the following as comparison areas against which the impact
study area is compared and contrasted pursuant to sections 487.9 and
487.10
of this Part to evaluate
potential significant and adverse disproportionate environmental impacts in the
impact study area: (1)
the county in which
the facility is proposed to be located; and
(2)
adjacent communities as defined in
section
487.3
(a) of this

Part. (b) If the
facility is proposed to be located within the City of New York, the city as a
whole must be used as a third comparison area in addition to the comparison
areas identified in subdivision (a) of this section. Notes
